tags.name: Execution
tags.description: Execution pipelines as raw or stored

post.description: Start pipeline execution with raw input, returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

name.description: Unique identifier representing a specific pipeline

algorithmName.description: Unique identifier representing a specific algorithm

pipelineName.description: Unique identifier representing a specific pipeline

ttl.description: Algorithm execution time to live in seconds. 0 to disable
pipeline time to live in seconds

items.description: Unique identifier representing a specific tag

rootJobId.description: the root job id of the current tree

defaultFlow.description: the name of the default stream flow

flows.description: define streaming flow in simple syntax, if node A stream to B and C, node B stream to D will be like "A >> B&C , B >> D

requestBody.description: an object representing all information needed for pipeline execution

post.description: Start pipeline execution when the name of the pipeline is known, all parameters in this action will be merged with the stored pipeline and then returns jobId that can be used as a reference for the pipeline to do actions such as results/status/stop, etc.

return status of pipelines by given pipeline name

return cron status by given pipeline name

get.description: get specific algorithm from store

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: algorithm name to get from the store

name.description: Unique identifier representing a specific algorithm

algorithmImage.description: image name as in the docker registry

reservedMemory.description: Reserved memory for HKube's operations such as in-memory cache, higher value means faster data retrieval and less algorithm memory, lower value means slower data retrieval and more algorithm memory

devMode.description: runs algorithm with mounted sources to allow rapid development cycles

opengl.description: should algorithm support XGL context creation (mount X socket)

mounts.description: a list of volumes to mount into the algorithm

pvcName.description: name of an existing kubernetes pvc (persistent volume claim)

path.description: the mount path in the algorithm container

url.description: a url for the git repository

branchName.description: the branch name you wish to create a build from

tag.description: a specific tag which will trigger the build

token.description: a token which allows hkube's build system to access private repositories more information https://help.github.com/en/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line

baseImage.description: Custom docker image to be used as base to the newly built algorithm image

minHotWorkers.description: how many live algorithm instances will always run

quotaGuarantee.description: The amount of algorithms required to be scheduled first in a case of cluster pressure

algorithmEnv.description: key value environment variables for algorithm

workerEnv.description: key value environment variables for worker

nodeSelector.description: key value labels for nodes constraint

downloadFileExt.description: the extension name that will be attached to a file when downloading algorithm result

parameters.description: algorithm name to get from the store
